hero_image.title: Hero image - Wybór platformy dla stron internetowych
hero_image.description: Minimalistyczne biuro z laptopem wyświetlającym porównanie platform, dokumenty z analizą technologii
hero_image.alt_text: Laptop z porównaniem platform WordPress Webflow na biurku z dokumentami analizy technologii
hero_image.prompt: Modern minimalist workspace flat lay view, laptop displaying platform comparison dashboard with WordPress vs Webflow interfaces, white wooden desk, business documents with technology analysis notes, yellow pen and notebook, coffee cup, natural daylight from window, clean composition, muted colors black white gray with subtle yellow accent, professional business aesthetic, high quality, no people

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Modern workspace, natural lighting, tech-focused composition with clean aesthetic

section_media.title: Tabela porównawcza platform - budżet vs funkcjonalność
section_media.description: Macierz porównawcza pokazująca WordPress, Webflow, Headless i Custom pod kątem kosztów i możliwości
section_media.alt_text: Tabela porównawcza kosztów i funkcjonalności WordPress Webflow Headless Custom development
section_media.prompt: Clean comparison matrix table showing WordPress vs Webflow vs Headless vs Custom development, budget ranges, functionality scores, timeline estimates, professional infographic style, blue and gray color scheme with yellow highlights, minimalist design, business presentation format

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Professional comparison matrix, clean design. Canva has excellent templates for decision matrices.

section_media.title: Diagram decyzyjny - Jak wybrać platformę
section_media.description: Flowchart z pytaniami kluczowymi prowadzący do rekomendacji platformy
section_media.alt_text: Diagram decyzyjny wyboru platformy internetowej z pytaniami o budżet zespół i cele
section_media.prompt: Decision tree flowchart diagram showing platform selection process, numbered steps with questions about budget, team skills, business goals, arrows leading to WordPress Webflow Headless Custom recommendations, clean infographic style, professional blue gray colors with yellow decision points, minimalist design

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Clean flowchart with decision points, arrows and outcomes. Professional business style.

section_media.title: Wykres kosztów całkowitych platform w 3 lata
section_media.description: Wykres słupkowy pokazujący TCO (Total Cost of Ownership) dla różnych platform w okresie 3 lat
section_media.alt_text: Wykres kosztów całkowitych utrzymania WordPress Webflow Headless Custom przez 3 lata
section_media.prompt: Professional stacked bar chart showing 3-year Total Cost of Ownership for WordPress, Webflow, Headless, Custom platforms, breakdown by development, hosting, maintenance, team costs, clean design with blue gradients and yellow accents, business presentation style

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Professional financial chart, clear data visualization with cost breakdown elements.

section_media.title: Screenshot interfejsu Webflow Designer
section_media.description: Interface Webflow Designer pokazujący edycję responsywną bez kodu
section_media.alt_text: Interface Webflow Designer z edytorem wizualnym i panelami responsive design
section_media.prompt: Clean screenshot mockup of Webflow Designer interface showing visual editor, responsive design panels, element properties, canvas with modern website design, professional UI design, annotated key features, high quality interface screenshot

stock_suggestions.unsplash_query: web design interface editor screen mockup
stock_suggestions.style_notes: Clean software interface, modern design tool aesthetic, professional workspace view.

section_media.title: Diagram architektury Headless CMS
section_media.description: Schemat pokazujący rozdzielenie backend/frontend w architekturze headless
section_media.alt_text: Diagram architektury headless CMS z podziałem backend frontend i komunikacją API
section_media.prompt: Technical architecture diagram showing headless CMS structure, separated backend and frontend components, API connections, multiple front-end channels (web, mobile, app), clean technical illustration style, blue and gray colors with connecting arrows, professional system design

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Technical diagram style, clear component separation, professional system architecture aesthetic.

section_media.title: Infografika - 5 najczęstszych błędów przy wyborze platformy
section_media.description: Pionowa infografika z ikonami pokazująca typowe pułapki w wyborze technologii
section_media.alt_text: Infografika 5 błędów przy wyborze platformy internetowej z ikonami ostrzeżeń
section_media.prompt: Vertical warning infographic showing 5 common platform selection mistakes: focusing only on initial cost, overestimating technical skills, ignoring scalability, choosing without consultation, skipping testing phase. Red warning icons, professional design, numbered points, clean layout

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Warning-style infographic with red accents, clear numbered points, professional business design.

section_media.title: Obraz zespołu programistycznego workspace
section_media.description: Workspace zespołu deweloperskiego z wieloma monitorami, kodem, dokumentacją projektową
section_media.alt_text: Workspace programistów z monitorami kodem i dokumentacją projektów custom development
section_media.prompt: Professional development workspace with multiple monitors showing code editors, system architecture diagrams, project documentation, modern office setup, clean desk organization, natural lighting, tech startup aesthetic, muted colors with yellow notebook accent, no people visible, high quality workspace photography

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Professional development workspace, multiple screens, clean setup, modern tech office aesthetic.
